name: SlackForceZQuote
description: Simple message broker to enable Slack to Salesforce communication using Slash Commands

SF_CLIENT_ID.description: Consumer key of your Salesforce Connected App

SF_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Consumer secret of your Salesforce Connected App

SLACK_QUOTE_TOKEN.description: Slack token for the quote slash command

SLACK_ACCOUNT_TOKEN.description: Slack token for the account slash command

SLACK_CONTACT_TOKEN.description: Slack token for the contact slash command

SLACK_INTERACT_TOKEN.description: Slack token for the interaction slash command
